statements: UPDATE neural_network_configurations SET activation_function = 'relu', model_name = 'model1', optimizer = 'adam', layers = 'dense' WHERE experiment_id = 1;
UPDATE neural_network_configurations SET model_name = 'model2', layers = 'convolutional, dense', optimizer = 'sgd', activation_function = 'sigmoid' WHERE experiment_id = 2;
UPDATE neural_network_configurations SET activation_function='ReLU', optimizer='Adam', layers='[100, 50, 10]' WHERE experiment_id=1
UPDATE neural_network_configurations SET optimizer='SGD', layers='[200, 100]', activation_function='Sigmoid' WHERE experiment_id=2
UPDATE neural_networks SET layers = 10, learning_rate = 0.001 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE experiments SET result = 'Success' WHERE experiment_name = 'First Experiment';
UPDATE neural_networks SET learning_rate = 0.01, activation_function = 'sigmoid' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE experiments SET result = 'Successful', experiment_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE experiment_name = 'Image Classification';
UPDATE neural_networks SET optimizer = 'Adam' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE experiments SET accuracy = 0.85 WHERE neural_network_id = 2;
UPDATE neural_networks SET optimizer = 'Adam' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE hyperparameters SET batch_size = 64, learning_rate = 0.001 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE neural_networks SET name = 'CNN Model', optimizer = 'Adam' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE experiments SET end_date = '2022-01-31 23:59:59' WHERE experiment_id = 2;
UPDATE neural_networks SET layers='[C1, C2, F]' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE experiments SET start_date='2022-10-01 08:00:00', end_date='2023-01-15 20:30:00' WHERE experiment_id=3;
UPDATE neural_networks SET learning_rate = 0.01 WHERE name = 'CNN';
UPDATE experiments SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE experiment_name = 'Image Recognition'
UPDATE neural_networks SET layers = ARRAY['input', 'hidden', 'output'], learning_rate = 0.001 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE results SET accuracy = 0.85, loss = 0.12 WHERE experiment_id = 3;
